testcase.name: For buying a home
testcase.system-out: Given after successful login into the 99Acres website.......................passed When user selects the for buyer option on website it shows a dropdown.......passed And select the property in hyderabad option and clicks unnder construction option.passed Then select the divine space 2BHK flat......................................passed

testcase.name: To buy a Plot
testcase.system-out: Given after successful login into the 99Acres website.......................passed When user selects buyer option then click on Plot and click on East facing option.passed And select one Plot.........................................................passed Then view the review page...................................................passed

testcase.name: To buy a commercial property
testcase.system-out: Given after successful login into the 99Acres website.......................passed When user selects buyer option then clicks on commercial sale in Hyderabad..passed And clicks on Post property.................................................passed Then it should clicks dropdown button and display required..................passed

testcase.name: Insights assertion
testcase.system-out: Given after successful login into the 99Acres website.......................passed When user selects buyer option then clicks on insights......................passed And clicks on locality insights.............................................passed Then display whether chosen city is selected or not.........................passed

testcase.name: Mobile App
testcase.system-out: Given after successful login into the 99Acres website.......................passed When user selects buyer option then clicks on commercial....................passed And clicks on first link....................................................passed Then clicks on mobile app option............................................passed
